input.name: optionValue
input.label: Value
input.help-text: [Required] The value submitted if this option is selected

input.name: optionText
input.label: Display text
input.help-text: [Required] The text displayed to the user next to the radio button

input.name: optionChecked
input.label: Checked?
input.help-text: [Optional] Set whether this option should be pre-selected. Note that you have to pay attention to only pre-select one option, or the results can be a bit random.
